post.body:
Hi guys i'm splinterk and today i wanna show you my new Python Framework i've created. It's name is Snakez and it's a framework to create HTML,CSS,PHP and JavaScript code fast and easily... without cheating ( WordPress... Puah! )
All that you need is a basic understanding of web development, a terminal and a text editor! 
Link : http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GaZYNPuLFN9KPz3nVAs2tojwiJjyGuA1Q/

HAPPY HACKING!

Good morning... Just uploaded the fixed version :
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GaZYNPuLFN9KPz3nVAs2tojwiJjyGuA1Q/

HAPPY HACKING

Hi guys i just wann say a quick thing :
I think is kind of obvious, but Snakez has to be launched with python2.7, soon it'll be compatible for both version

Sorry, for this problem... if you have any questions you can comment here or write me on ZeroMail

HAPPY HACKING!

Hi guys now Snakez is compatible with all Python versions... as i said " soon it will be compatible ".... yes like 5 hours ago XD

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GaZYNPuLFN9KPz3nVAs2tojwiJjyGuA1Q/

Sorry for my inactivity.... but don't worry, i'm working on snakez and a new update will come soon!
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GaZYNPuLFN9KPz3nVAs2tojwiJjyGuA1Q/
The update is coming... there will be some new features... if a tell you Django? See ya at : http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GaZYNPuLFN9KPz3nVAs2tojwiJjyGuA1Q/

We reached and surpassed 100 peers! That's amazing!
Se you at :  http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GaZYNPuLFN9KPz3nVAs2tojwiJjyGuA1Q/
